summary: "TAKATA RECALL DATE 2/9/2016. AND IN MAY 2016 INFORMED BY VW OF HIGH RISKS. AND IMMINENT DANGER...NO FURTHER RESPONSE TO INQUIRIES...AS OF  JULY 14,2017 NO REMEDY AVAILABLE...CONCERNED FOR SAFETY OF OCCUPANTS AND OTHER DRIVERS...SUGGEST VW LIVE UP TO THEIR ACKNOWLEDGED RESPONSIBILITY AND PROVIDE EQUITABLE AND SAFE CAR TO DRIVE OR OTHERWISE COMPENSATE SO THAT I CAN REPLACE THEIR DANGEROUS VEHICLE. APPRECIATE YOUR ATTENTION TO MY "AT -RISK: SITUATION [XXX] [XXX] [XXX].    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).'*JB
